original_text: At that time, the Lord your God will choose one special place for his people to worship him. You must take there everything that I have told you. Take your burnt offerings and other sacrifices to offer to the Lord. Take your tithes and special offerings. Take the special gifts that you have promised to give to him. Take everything to the place that God will choose.
korean_text: 너희는 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 자기 이름을 두시려고 택하실 그 곳으로 내가 명령하는 것을 모두 가지고 갈지니 곧 너희의 번제와 너희의 희생과 너희의 십일조와 너희 손의 거제와 너희가 여호와께서 원하시는 모든 아름다운 서원물을 가져가고

sentences.original_text: the Lord your God will choose one special place
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님께서 한 특별한 장소를 선택하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: for his people to worship him
everything that I have told you
and other sacrifices to offer to the Lord
Take your tithes and special offerings
that you have promised to give to him
to the place that God will choose
